column1: Little Goat Diner////Maybe I'm not a dinner guy
column2: or maybe I just realize 100 items can't all be good
column3: but Little Goat just doesn't do it for me. I've tried both dinner and brunch and both times I left missing something.  Items seem a bit too heavy
column4: but not yet filling.  The bakery aspect is pretty spot on but this isn't a fill in for Girl if you can't get in.
